TableSpec.Name: MIMED Batch
TableSpec.Description: Stores information about usr MIMED patient batch records
TableSpec.Author: UM Dev

TextField.Description: For individuals, stores the first name.
TextField.Name: FIRSTNAME

TextField.Description: For individuals, stores the middle name.
TextField.Name: MIDDLENAME

TextField.Description: For individuals, stores the last name.
TextField.Name: LASTNAME

GuidField.Description: For individuals, stores country for the address.
GuidField.Name: ADDRESSCOUNTRYID

DateField.Description: For individuals, address historical start date
DateField.Name: HISTORICALSTARTDATE

GuidField.Description: For individuals, stores country for the phone number.
GuidField.Name: PHONE_COUNTRYID

GuidField.Description: For individuals, stores country for the (other) phone number.
GuidField.Name: PHONE_OTHER_COUNTRYID

GuidField.Description: For individual, DM Ineligible Reason Code
GuidField.Name: DMINELIGIBLEREASONCODEID

GuidField.Description: For individuals, Wealth Engine Data Mining Score (Med)
GuidField.Name: WEDMSCORECODEID

DateField.Description: For individuals, Wealth Engine Data Mining Score (Med) start date
DateField.Name: WEDMSCORESTARTDATE

GuidField.Description: For individuals, Wealth Engine Est Giv Capacity (Med)
GuidField.Name: WEESTGIVCAPACITYCODEID

TextField.Description: For individuals, Wealth Engine Est Giv Capacity (Med) comment
TextField.Name: WEESTGIVCAPACITYCOMMENT

DateField.Description: For individuals, Wealth Engine Est Giv Capacity (Med) start date
DateField.Name: WEESTGIVCAPACITYSTARTDATE

DateField.Description: Date on the records imported from the UMHSDATA datamart.
DateField.Name: UMHSDATA_LASTPROCDATE

BooleanField.Description: Is record imported from the Grateful Patient import process
BooleanField.Name: ISGPIMPORTEDRECORD

BooleanField.Description: Does the constiuent have an affilation and/or constiteuncy of Faculty, Staff, or Board Member with U-M
BooleanField.Name: HASUMAFFILIATION

TextField.Description: For individuals, Blackbaud Wealth Scores for Total Estimated Assets
TextField.Name: WEALTHSCORES_TOTALESTIMATEDASSETS

GuidField.Description: For individuals, Blackbaud Wealth Scores for Rating
GuidField.Name: WEALTHSCORES_RATINGID
